headline: BlackRock buys up Bitmine shares as Ethereum threatens to fall to $1,400 price
summary: Blackrock’s Bitmine share holdings jumped 166% in the fourth-quarter of 2025. CEO Larry Fink is bullish on tokenisation with the company citing Ethereum as the big winner.

content.title: BlackRock buys up Bitmine shares as Ethereum threatens to fall to $1,400 price
content.summary: Blackrock’s Bitmine share holdings jumped 166% in the fourth-quarter of 2025. CEO Larry Fink is bullish on tokenisation with the company citing Ethereum as the big winner.

headline: BlackRock Deepens Tokenization Push With BUIDL Trading And Uniswap Governance
summary: BlackRock (NYSE:BLK) has begun trading its tokenized U.S. Treasury fund, BUIDL, on Uniswap's decentralized finance platform. The firm has also purchased Uniswap's governance token, tying its asset management business directly into DeFi decision making. This move represents BlackRock's first direct use of decentralized finance trading infrastructure for a tokenized fund. BlackRock, the world's largest asset manager, has been expanding its presence in digital assets. This step into DeFi...

headline: Fintech Postpones IPO As Software Sell-Off Spooks Investors
summary: Just as the IPO market was picking up momentum, one of the biggest IPOs so far this year was suddenly shelved Friday.  Clear Street Group reportedly postponed its initial public offering, citing market conditions.  The New York-based fintech will reconsider its IPO at a later time, Bloomberg and Reuters reported.

content.title: Fintech Postpones IPO As Software Sell-Off Spooks Investors
content.summary: Just as the IPO market was picking up momentum, one of the biggest IPOs so far this year was suddenly shelved Friday.  Clear Street Group reportedly postponed its initial public offering, citing market conditions.  The New York-based fintech will reconsider its IPO at a later time, Bloomberg and Reuters reported.

headline: Danske Bank Opens Crypto ETPs As New Fee And Retention Lever
summary: Danske Bank has ended its eight year ban on crypto access by offering Bitcoin and Ethereum ETPs to customers. The products are available through the bank's online and mobile platforms in partnership with issuers including BlackRock and WisdomTree. The change follows increased regulatory clarity in Europe and growing demand from clients for regulated crypto exposure. For investors watching CPSE:DANSKE, this policy shift comes as the share price stands at about DKK325.9, with a 1 year return...

headline: Nasdaq Falls For Fifth Week in a Row
summary: The Nasdaq Composite fell for a fifth week in a row on Friday. The tech-heavy index fell 0.2%, and locked in a fifth weekly decline in as many weeks. The S&P 500 was flat on the day but slid for a second consecutive week.

content.title: Nasdaq Falls For Fifth Week in a Row
content.summary: The Nasdaq Composite fell for a fifth week in a row on Friday. The tech-heavy index fell 0.2%, and locked in a fifth weekly decline in as many weeks. The S&P 500 was flat on the day but slid for a second consecutive week.
